English
In a future where Earth's ecosystem verges on collapse, man-made robots roam the
city to protect dwindling human life. When a robot overrides a key protocol put in
place to protect human life, ROC Robotics insurance agent Jacq Vaucan
(Antonio Banderas) is assigned to locate the source of the manipulation and eliminate
the threat. What he discovers leads Vaucan, ROC Robotics and the police into a battle
with profound consequences for the future of humanity.
